metadata.title: CVE-2023-52602 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: jfs:fix slab-out-of-bounds Read in dtSearch Currently while searching forcurrent page in the sorted entry table of the page there is a out of boundaccess. Added a bound check to fix the error. Dave: Set return code to -EIO

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-225-generic - 4.15.0-225.237
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-225-generic - 4.15.0-225.237
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-225-lowlatency - 4.15.0-225.237
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-181-generic - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-181-lowlatency - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-225.237').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
